thread.section_title: 11 Howard - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Avocado Toast!
thread.title_full: Avocado Toast! - Review of 11 Howard, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Eff-Ulloa
title: Avocado Toast!
text:
Besides being one of the best looking hotels in NYC's trendy SoHo neighborhood, the 11 Howard has the best avocado toast NYC has to offer. But the excellent rating is not necessarily due to the amazing food, it is mainly because of the overall experience. This hotel really know how to do hospitality. If you were to google search 'define: great hospitality' the 11 Howard would come up as a perfect example. You think I am lying? Go and check it out for yourself! ;)
Room Tip: Be sure to use your Expedia account when booking as you might end up getting a free upgrade. See more room tips
